name: Money Maker Harold
description:
Money Maker Harold - Jam Version

Your computer is infected by a new Virus.
Harold is your only hope to get rid of it.
Will you be able to save all your cryptos and be wealthy again?

Play as Harold and his friends and defeat all the viruses compromising your RPG Maker softwares.

===========================================================

Real Time Battles No time to waste!
*Use your 'Infinite' Skills indefinitely by clicking fast on your allies/enemies! *Enough AP for a killing blow? Time to use it! *Rinse & Repeat!

===========================================================

Credits Music

"Corrupted Circuitry" by Joshua "JDSherbert" Herbert in Minigame Music Pack

"Training Is Over" by Jonathan Shaw -> Website

Voices

Harold Attack Voice, made by Iwan Gabovitch, downloaded on opengameart.org

Plugins

Play Effect On Menu by Drag & Plugin-in

Graphic Assets

Other Assets - Characters, Music, SFX, Animations

Provided with RPG Maker MZ Engine
